hints.content:
We start at $9{:}05$ when Oliver and Rani finish their game of table tennis.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:15 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 8:15, 8:30, 8:45, 9:00, and 9:15 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 9:05. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Oliver and Rani started their game of table tennis, we go **left** ${48}$ minutes from $9{:}05$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{9{:}05} -{} &\goldE{5}\text{ minutes} = 9{:}00\\\\
{9{:}00} -{} &\purpleD{30}\text{ minutes} = 8{:}30\\\\
8{:}30 -{} & \blueD{10}\text{ minutes} = {8{:}20} \\\\
8{:}20 -{} & \maroonD{3}\text{ minutes} = \greenD{8{:}17} \\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:15 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 8:15, 8:30, 8:45, 9:00, and 9:15 are labeled. A series of four arrows are shown moving right to left from the 9:05 tick mark to the 8:17 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 9:05 tick mark and ends at the 9:00 tick mark and is labeled minus 5. The second arrow starts at the 9:00 tick mark and ends at the 8:30 tick mark and is labeled minus 30. The third arrow starts at the 8:30 tick mark and ends at the 8:20 tick mark and is labeled minus 10. The fourth arrow starts at the 8:20 tick mark and ends at the 8:17 tick mark and is labeled minus 3. !

hints.content:
Oliver and Rani started their game at $\greenD{8{:}17} $.  

Which clock shows $\greenD{8{:}17}$?

When Oliver and Rani started playing table tennis, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 8 and 9 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 3. !

question.content:
Oliver and Rani play a game of table tennis for $48$ minutes. They finished playing at $9{:}05 \text{ a.m.}$

**What time did the clock show when Oliver and Rani started playing table tennis?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 8 and 9 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/07aed562bad636b9cf2096065f90fd57a0484601)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 10 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5254b248a2f627d73a1d0fabc343bf51cf7e3fc6)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 8 and 9 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e81a23c6c9bc251b14c2e370c02c037589326c85)
